remarks: Lemma for ~ cznrng :  The base set of the ring constructed from a ` Z/nZ ` structure by replacing the (multiplicative) ring operation by a constant operation is the base set of the ` Z/nZ ` structure. (Contributed by AV, 16-Feb-2020.)
statement:
cznrng.y $e |- Y = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
cznrng.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
cznrng.x $e |- X = ( Y sSet <. ( .r ` ndx ) , ( x e. B , y e. B |-> C ) >. ) $.
cznrnglem $p |- B = ( Base ` X ) $.
